tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE restoration_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE restoration_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE restoration_projects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE project_tasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  task_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  task_end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  task_budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES restoration_projects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_members (
  member_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES restoration_projects (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationProjects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Restoration_Projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Project_Tasks (
    task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Restoration_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Project_Team (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    team_lead TEXT NOT NULL,
    team_member_count INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Restoration_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Budget_Expenses (
    expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    expense_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    expense_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    expense_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Restoration_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Task_Assignments (
    assignment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    assignment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    assignment_status TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Project_Tasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Project_Team(team_id)
);
